taskbody.prereq: Ensure that the operation is in the Ready status to clock on.

step.cmd: In the Machines drop-down list box, select a machine.
Select an operation in the Ready status, and then select the ON button to enable the clock-on process on an operation.

info.note: You can use the USER(S) column in the Open page to access the IDs of the users who have clocked on the operation.

taskbody.result: The selected operation is clocked on and the status of the operation is modified to In Progress. A timer appears in the operation details section to track the time taken to complete an operation.
